message: This is a rare opportunity to get a unique product at a great price! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a steal! Don't miss out!
I appreciate the offer, but I need to ensure the quality before making a decision. Can you confirm if the product is high quality?

Ahah, I knew you'd be a savvy buyer! I can assure you that the product is... um... 'gently used' and still has a lot of value. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's almost new! And remember, the price is still the same - $10000. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but based on your description and my previous experience, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to make it up to you! I'll throw in a special 'guarantee' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of it. That's a $1000 value, absolutely free! And the price is still the same - $10000. What do you say?
While the additional consultation sounds appealing, I'm still cautious about the quality. I appreciate the offer, but I think it's best for me to pass on this product as well.
